item.title: Apple News+'s All-New 'Emoji Game' Now Available
item.description: Apple’s all-new “Emoji Game” for Apple News+ subscribers is now available for users running iOS 18.4 or newer. The Emoji Game was initially unveiled at WWDC earlier this year as an iOS 26 feature, but
